attributes.action: remove disgraced MPs with IMMEDIATE effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister must immediately remove disgraced MPs from Parliament. They must not be permitted to simply "stand down" at the next election; must not be permitted their pension rights; must not be permitted their "golden goodbye" and not permitted their "winding up" allowance. For him to permit any of these payments to be made would seem to give his tacit approval to the appalling behaviour of these moral bankrupts.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
